Description: Complete CloudFormation template for RDS Consolidator QuickSight Dataset and Analysis with all visuals

S3BucketName.Description: The S3 bucket where the CSV file is stored

ManifestKey.Description: The S3 key for the manifest file

DataSourceName.Description: Name for the QuickSight data source

TextBoxes.Content:
Amazon RDS Consolidator
Version 16c - 08/22/2025

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">The graphs below show the distribution of the instance collection per engine and version. It give hints on the consolidation capabilities and upgrade requirements.</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">The 3 graphics below show the consolidated vCPUs activity for the instance set compared to the allocated vCPUs. It also break down par instance the average and peak vCPUs activity.</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">This visual shows the vCPU usage versus free vCPU in absolute value</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">The 3 graphics below show the consolidated average and peak ACU activity for the instance set compared. It also break down par instance the average and peak vCPUs activity.</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">The visual below show the consolidated IOPS activity average and peak for both the read and write.</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">The visual below shows the sum of the allocated storage of the instance cohort. It also draws the space used vs. free GiB.</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">The visual below ranks the instance per allocated and unsed storage. It tells how much GiB you can potentially save per instance.</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">The 2 visuals below tell the memory allocation for the cohort and the usage per instance. The right hand side visual indicates the memory pressure per instance.</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">The visual below shows the number of connections per instance over the analysis period. It helps size the amount of memory of the instance and the connections in your parameter group.</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

<text-box>
  <block>
    <inline font-size="16px">The 2 visuals below help you to estimate the memory size and pressure of the cohort. The first graph stacks the used memory per instance. The second graph shows the evolution of the swap activity. An increase in this graph may indicate an under-sized memory.</inline>
  </block>
</text-box>

FormatText.RichText: <visual-title>Percentage of Used vs. Free Memory per instance</visual-title>

AnalysisUrl.Description: URL to access the QuickSight Analysis

DashboardUrl.Description: URL to access the QuickSight Dashboard
